oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sho-|oa, a Bushman vegetable medicine, used also as a charm (L II.-36. 3242-3261). How one man fights with another, having previously rubbed his own hands with Sho-|oa; and how he afterwards restores the man with whom he fought, by means of a fresh application of Sho-|oa (L II.-36. 3262-3268). ,
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Ssho |oa or ||karruken-||karruken or |u ssho a
